name: Joy of Spring Festival
info: Help prepare for the Spring Festival by gathering flowers, decorating, and protecting the celebration.
accept: Of course! I'll help you make this festival wonderful!
decline: I'm too busy to help with the festival preparations.

objectives.poppy_collect: Collect beautiful flowers for the spring celebration
objectives.plant_seeds: Plant seeds to grow more plants for the festival
objectives.leather_helmet_craft: Craft elegant flower crowns for festival participants

dialogs: Spring Festival is coming but there's so much to prepare! Can you help?
We need lots of flowers. Please collect dandelions and tulips.
It would be more beautiful if you plant flowers around the festival grounds.
Oh no! Zombies are trying to ruin the festival!
Thank you so much! It's going to be a wonderful festival!
